revisions.rev:
{{Main article|Commemorative coins of Poland}} Poland has a rich selection of [[Gold]] and [[Silver]] commemorative coins. In the year 2008 coins were launched in the series: "Animals of the World", "Monuments of Material Culture in Poland" (previously "Castles and Palaces in Poland"), "Polish Painters of the Turn of 19th and 20th Centuries", "The Polish Calendar of Traditional Customs and Rituals", "History of the Polish Zloty", and various occasional coins. {{cite web | url=http://www.mennica.com.pl/index.php?pt=/2/statics/79,20/collector_and_commemorative_coins.html | title=Collector and commemorative coins| publisher=Mint of Poland| accessdate=2009-01-02}} {{cite web | url=http://www.nbp.pl/en/banknoty/kolekcjonerskie/plan_2008_en.pdf | title=Schedule for Issuance of Polish COLLECTOR Coins for the Year 2008 | publisher=National Bank of Poland | accessdate=2009-01-01}} {|class="wikitable" width="100%" |- ! colspan="4" align=center style="background:#eeeeee;"| ''Animals of the World:'' [[Peregrine falcon]] (Falco peregrinus){{cite web | url=http://www.nbp.pl/en/banknoty/kolekcjonerskie/2008/sokol_en.pdf | title=Peregrine falcon coin | publisher=National Bank of Poland| accessdate=2009-01-01}} |- | colspan="2" width="50%" align=center | '''Reverse designer:''' Ewa Tyc-KarpiÅska,
'''Obverse designer:''' Roussanka Nowakowska | colspan="2" width="50%" align=center | '''Mint:''' [[Polish Mint|Mennica Polska S.A.]] |- | align=center | '''Value:''' zÅ 20 | align=center | '''Alloy:''' Ag 925 (Silver) | align=center | '''Quantity:''' 107,000 pcs | align=center | '''Quality:''' Proof |- | align=center | '''Issued:''' 16 January 2008 {{cite web | url=http://www.nbp.pl/Homen.aspx?f=en/banknoty/kolekcjonerskie/2008.html | title=Collector coins and 2 zl Nordic Gold coins issued by the NBP in 2008 | publisher=National Bank of Poland| accessdate=2009-01-01}} | align=center | '''Diameter:''' {{convert|38.61|mm|in|2|abbr=on}} | align=center | '''Weight:''' {{convert|28.28|g|oz ozt|2|abbr=on}} | align=center | '''Market value:''' 200 zÅ {{cite journal |title=Cennik monet kolekcjonerskich | journal=PrzeglÄd Numizmatyczny |publisher=Stowarzyszenie NumizmatykÃ³w Polskich - Polish Numismatic Society|volume=63/2008 |issue=4 |pages=23â26 |year=2008 |issn=1231-143X |oclc=68734851 }} |- | colspan="4" align=left | Part of the collection "Animals of the World". Obverse: An image of the [[eagle]] established as the State emblem of the Republic of Poland. Under the Eagle, the notation of the year of issue: 2008, below, an inscription, ZÅ 20 ZÅ. The images of the Polish national flag on the sides of the Eagleâs legs. At the top, a semicircular inscription, RZECZPOSPOLITA POLSKA. The Mintâs mark under the Eagleâs left leg, m/w.

Reverse: An image of an adult peregrine falcon and two chicks in a nest on a rock. On the right, a stylised image representing a fragment of a mountain range. At the top, a semicircular inscription, SOKÃÅ WÄDROWNY â Falco peregrinus. |- | colspan="4" |   |- ! colspan="4" align=center style="background:#eeeeee;"| 40th Anniversary of March 1968{{cite web | url=http://www.nbp.pl/en/banknoty/kolekcjonerskie/2008/marzec_en.pdf | title=40th Anniversary of March 1968 coin | publisher=National Bank of Poland| accessdate=2009-01-01}} |- | colspan="2" width="50%" align=center | '''Coin designer:''' Andrzej Nowakowski | colspan="2" width="50%" align=center | '''Mint:''' [[Polish Mint|Mennica Polska S.A.]] |- | align=center | '''Value:''' zÅ 10 | align=center | '''Alloy:''' Ag 925 (Silver) | align=center | '''Quantity:''' 118,000 pcs | align=center | '''Quality:''' Proof |- | align=center | '''Issued:''' 3 March 2008 | align=center | '''Diameter:''' {{convert|32|mm|in|2|abbr=on}} | align=center | '''Weight:''' {{convert|14.14|g|oz ozt|2|abbr=on}} | align=center | '''Market value:''' 160 zÅ |- | colspan="4" align=left | Obverse: On the right-hand side, an image of the Eagle established as the State Emblem of the Republic of Poland. On the right-hand side at the top, a semicircular inscription, RZECZPOSPOLITA POLSKA. Below the Eagle, on the right-hand-side, the notation of the year of issue, 2008. Below, the images of an open book on top of a closed book. On the left-hand side, the stylised images of falling book pages. The Mintâs mark, m/w, under the Eagleâs right leg.

Reverse: A stylised image of the main entrance gate of the University of Warsaw. Below, a stylised flag symbolizing the Polish national flag and stylised images of banners. At the top, a semicircular inscription, 40. ROCZNICA MARCA `68 (40th anniversary of March â68 events). At the bottom, the stylised images of militiamen and protesting students. |- | colspan="4" |   |- ! colspan="4" align=center style="background:#eeeeee;"| [[Sybiracy|Siberian exiles]] (gold){{cite web | url=http://www.nbp.pl/en/banknoty/kolekcjonerskie/2008/sybiracy_en.pdf | title=Siberian exiles coin | publisher=National Bank of Poland| accessdate=2009-01-01}} |- | colspan="2" width="50%" align=center | '''Coin designer:''' Ewa Tyc-KarpiÅska | colspan="2" width="50%" align=center | '''Mint:''' [[Polish Mint|Mennica Polska S.A.]] |- | align=center | '''Value:''' zÅ 100 | align=center | '''Alloy:''' Au 900/1000 (Gold) | align=center | '''Quantity:''' 12,000 pcs | align=center | '''Quality:''' Proof |- | align=center | '''Issued:''' 26 March 2008 | align=center | '''Diameter:''' {{convert|21|mm|in|2|abbr=on}} | align=center | '''Weight:''' {{convert|8|g|oz ozt|2|abbr=on}} | align=center | '''Market value:''' 800 zÅ |- | colspan="4" align=left | Obverse: On the left-hand side, an image of the Eagle established as the State Emblem of the Republic of Poland. On the right- hand side, human figures silhouetted against the tree trunks. On the right-hand side, a vertical inscription, 100 ZÅ. On the left-hand side and at the bottom, in the rim, a semicircular inscription, RZECZPOSPOLITA POLSKA, and the notation of the year of issue, 2008. The Mintâs mark, m/w, under the Eagleâs left leg.

Reverse: The stylised images of an old woman and a girl on the right-hand side, and of a fragment of a hut with a visible window on the left-hand side, separated by a stylised image of a tree trunk. On the right-hand side, a semicircular inscription, SYBIRACY (Siberian exiles). |- | colspan="4" |   |- ! colspan="4" align=center style="background:#eeeeee;"| [[Sybiracy|Siberian exiles]] (silver) |- | colspan="2" width="50%" align=center | '''Coin designer:''' Ewa Tyc-KarpiÅska | colspan="2" width="50%" align=center | '''Mint:''' [[Polish Mint|Mennica Polska S.A.]] |- | align=center | '''Value:''' zÅ 10 | align=center | '''Alloy:''' Ag 925/1000 (Silver) | align=center | '''Quantity:''' 135,000 pcs | align=center | '''Quality:''' Proof |- | align=center | '''Issued:''' 26 March 2008 | align=center | '''Diameter:''' {{convert|32|mm|in|2|abbr=on}} | align=center | '''Weight:''' {{convert|14.14|g|oz ozt|2|abbr=on}} | align=center | '''Market value:''' 100 zÅ |- | colspan="4" align=left | Obverse: On the left-hand side, an image of the Eagle established as the State Emblem of the Republic of Poland. In the cen- tral part and on the right-hand side, the images of human figures. On the right-hand side, a diagonal inscription, â¦ bylismy tlumem bezimiennym (â¦ we were a nameless crowd). At the bottom, on the right-hand side, an inscription, 10 ZÅ. On the left-hand side and at the top, in the rim, a semicircular inscription, RZECZPOSPOLITA POLSKA, and the notation of the year of issue, 2008. The Mintâs mark, m/w, under the Eagleâs left leg.

Reverse: In the central part, an inscription, SYBIRACY (Siberian exiles). In the background, a stylised image of the woods and its reflection. At the bottom, a zirconia stone. |- | colspan="4" |   |- ! colspan="4" align=center style="background:#eeeeee;"| 65th Anniversary of [[Warsaw Ghetto Uprising]] (gold){{cite web | url=http://www.nbp.pl/banknoty/kolekcjonerskie/2008/getto_pl.pdf | title=65th Anniversary of Warsaw Ghetto Uprising coin | publisher=National Bank of Poland| accessdate=2009-01-01}} {{cite web | url=http://www.mennica.com.pl/index.php?pt=/2/product/1116,20/65th_anniversary_of_warsaw_ghetto_uprising.html | title=65th Anniversary of Warsaw Ghetto Uprising coin | publisher=Polish Mint| accessdate=2009-01-01}} |- | colspan="2" width="50%" align=center | '''Coin designer:''' Urszula Walerzak | colspan="2" width="50%" align=center | '''Mint:''' [[Polish Mint|Mennica Polska S.A.]] |- | align=center | '''Value:''' zÅ 200 | align=center | '''Alloy:''' Au 900/1000 (Gold) | align=center | '''Quantity:''' 12,000 pcs | align=center | '''Quality:''' Proof |- | align=center | '''Issued:''' 15 April 2008 | align=center | '''Diameter:''' {{convert|27|mm|in|2|abbr=on}} | align=center | '''Weight:''' {{convert|15.50|g|oz ozt|2|abbr=on}} | align=center | '''Market value:''' |- | colspan="4" align=left | Obverse:

Reverse: |- | colspan="4" |   |- ! colspan="4" align=center style="background:#eeeeee;"| [[Zbigniew Herbert]] (1924 - 1998) (gold){{cite web | url=http://www.nbp.pl/en/banknoty/kolekcjonerskie/2008/herbert_en.pdf | title=Zbigniew Herbert coin | publisher=National Bank of Poland| accessdate=2009-01-01}} |- | colspan="2" width="50%" align=center | '''Coin designer:''' Dominika KarpiÅska-Kopiec | colspan="2" width="50%" align=center | '''Mint:''' [[Polish Mint|Mennica Polska S.A.]] |- | align=center | '''Value:''' zÅ 200 | align=center | '''Alloy:''' Au 900/1000 (Gold) | align=center | '''Quantity:''' 11,200 pcs | align=center | '''Quality:''' Proof |- | align=center | '''Issued:''' 30 May 2008 | align=center | '''Diameter:''' {{convert|27|mm|in|2|abbr=on}} | align=center | '''Weight:''' {{convert|15.50|g|oz ozt|2|abbr=on}} | align=center | '''Market value:''' |- | colspan="4" align=left | Obverse: On the left-hand side, an image of the Eagle established as the State Emblem of the Republic of Poland. On the right-hand side, the half-fgure of Zbigniew Herbert. In the rim, a semicircular inscription, RZECZPOSPOLITA POLSKA and the notation of the year of issue, 2008 plus an inscription, 1924-1998 ZBIGNIEW HERBERT. Below, in the centre, a vertical inscription, 200 ZÅ. The Mintâs mark, m/w, under the Eagleâs left leg.

Reverse: Stylised image of a fragment of a mounted statue of Marcus Aurelius. On the left-hand side and above a circumscription, DO MARKA AURELEGO / TO MARCUS AURELIUS.

Below, in the centre, a vertical inscription, 10 ZÅ. The Mintâs mark, m/w, under the Eagleâs left leg.

Reverse: Stylised image of the Nike of Samothrace statue against the back-ground of a bent silhouette of Zbigniew Herbert with a double outline of the head. On the right-hand side, a semicircular inscription, NIKE KTÃRA SIÄ WAHA / NIKE WHO HESITATES.

Photograph of Z. Herbert used in the coin design by Danuta Åomaczewska |- | colspan="4" |   |- ! colspan="4" align=center style="background:#eeeeee;"| '''''Monuments of Material Culture in Poland''''' [[Kazimierz Dolny]]{{cite web | url=http://www.nbp.pl/en/banknoty/kolekcjonerskie/2008/kazimierz_en.pdf | title=Kazimierz Dolny coin | publisher=National Bank of Poland| accessdate=2009-01-01}} |- | colspan="2" width="50%" align=center | '''Coin designer:''' Ewa Olszewska-Borys | colspan="2" width="50%" align=center | '''Mint:''' [[Polish Mint|Mennica Polska S.A.]] |- | align=center | '''Value:''' zÅ 20 | align=center | '''Alloy:''' Ag 925/1000 (Silver) | align=center | '''Quantity:''' 125,000 pcs | align=center | '''Quality:''' Proof |- | align=center | '''Issued:''' 19 June 2008 | align=center | '''Diameter:''' {{convert|38.61|mm|in|2|abbr=on}} | align=center | '''Weight:''' {{convert|28.28|g|oz ozt|2|abbr=on}} | align=center | '''Market value:''' |- | colspan="4" align=left | Obverse: At the top of the coin, in the middle, an image of the eagle established as the State Emblem of the republic of Poland. underneath the eagle, on the right-hand side, an inscription, 20 ZL, on the left-hand side, a stylised image of a wall coping fragment of the Celej family tenement in Kazimierz Dolny. At the top and on the right-hand side, a semicircular inscription, RZECZPOSPOLITA POLSKA and the notation of the year of issue, 2008. The Mintâs mark under the eagleâs left leg, m/w.

Reverse: on the left-hand side, stylised images: of a shingle-roofed well and of roofs of the houses by the marketplace in Kazimierz Dolny. In the centre, a stylised image of part of the parish church. At the top, a semicircular inscription, KAZIMIERZ DOLNY. |- | colspan="4" |   |- ! colspan="4" align=center style="background:#eeeeee;"| [[2008_Olympic_Games|XXIXth Olympic Games]] - Beijing 2008 (gold){{cite web | url=http://www.nbp.pl/en/banknoty/kolekcjonerskie/2008/pekin_en.pdf | title=Beijing 2008 coin | publisher=National Bank of Poland| accessdate=2009-01-01}} |- | colspan="2" width="50%" align=center | '''Coin designer:''' Robert Kotowicz | colspan="2" width="50%" align=center | '''Mint:''' [[Polish Mint|Mennica Polska S.A.]] |- | align=center | '''Value:''' zÅ 200 | align=center | '''Alloy:''' Au 900/1000 (Gold, angle effect) | align=center | '''Quantity:''' 13,500 pcs | align=center | '''Quality:''' Proof |- | align=center | '''Issued:''' 23 July 2008 | align=center | '''Diameter:''' {{convert|27.00|mm|in|2|abbr=on}} | align=center | '''Weight:''' {{convert|15.50|g|oz ozt|2|abbr=on}} | align=center | '''Market value:''' |- | colspan="4" align=left | Obverse: On the right-hand side an image of the Eagle established as the State Emblem of the Republic of Poland. Below the Eagle the notation of the year of issue, 2008. Above the Eagle stylised images of two Chinese kites. At the left-hand side of the Eagle and below â stylised ribbons of kites. At the top on the left-hand side a stylised image of an element of Chinese ornamentation or the Polish Olympic Committee logo visible depending on the angle of sight. In the rim at the bottom a circumscription, RZECZPOSPOLITA POLSKA, and a circumscription, 200 ZÅ. The Mintâs mark under the Eagleâs left leg: m/w.

Reverse: In the centre a stylised image of female pole vault jumper. On the left-hand side an inscription, BEIJING/2008. In the background above and at the left-hand side a stylised image of the silhouettes of a Chinese pagoda. Below in the rim, an inscription, POLSKA REPREZENTACJA OLIMPIJSKA (Polish Olympic Representation). |- | colspan="4" |   |- ! colspan="4" align=center style="background:#eeeeee;"| [[2008_Olympic_Games|XXIXth Olympic Games]] - Beijing 2008 (sphere) |- | colspan="2" width="50%" align=center | '''Coin designer:''' Robert Kotowicz | colspan="2" width="50%" align=center | '''Mint:''' [[Polish Mint|Mennica Polska S.A.]] |- | align=center | '''Value:''' zÅ 10 | align=center | '''Alloy:''' Ag 925/1000, and an Au 1000/1000âplated duraluminium sphere | align=center | '''Quantity:''' 140,000 pcs | align=center | '''Quality:''' Proof |- | align=center | '''Issued:''' 23 July 2008 | align=center | '''Diameter:''' {{convert|32.00|mm|in|2|abbr=on}} | align=center | '''Weight:''' {{convert|14.14|g|oz ozt|2|abbr=on}} | align=center | '''Market value:''' |- | colspan="4" align=left | Obverse: Below an image of the Eagle established as the State Emblem of the Republic of Poland. At the sides of the Eagle the notation of the year issue, 2008. In the central part a golden sphere with the stylised image of Chinese ornament against the background of a stylised image of the dragon from the Nine Dragons Wall. A semicircular inscription above, RZECZPOSPOLITA POLSKA, below on the right-hand side an inscription, 10/ZÅ. The Mintâs mark under the Eagleâs left leg: m/w.

Reverse: In the central part of the coin a golden sphere with a stylised Polish Olympic Committee logo against of a background of the stylised image of water. Above the sphere a stylised image of the crawl swimmer. Below the sphere an inscription, Beijing / 2008. In the rim an inscription, POLSKA REPREZENTACJA OLIMPIJSKA (Polish Olympic Representation). |- | colspan="4" |   |- ! colspan="4" align=center style="background:#eeeeee;"| [[2008_Olympic_Games|XXIXth Olympic Games]] - Beijing 2008 (square hole) |- | colspan="2" width="50%" align=center | '''Coin designer:''' Urszula Walerzak | colspan="2" width="50%" align=center | '''Mint:''' [[Polish Mint|Mennica Polska S.A.]] |- | align=center | '''Value:''' zÅ 10 | align=center | '''Alloy:''' Ag 925/1000 (Silver) | align=center | '''Quantity:''' 150,000 pcs | align=center | '''Quality:''' Proof |- | align=center | '''Issued:''' 23 July 2008 | align=center | '''Diameter:''' {{convert|32.00|mm|in|2|abbr=on}} | align=center | '''Weight:''' {{convert|14.14|g|oz ozt|2|abbr=on}} | align=center | '''Market value:''' |- | colspan="4" align=left | Obverse: At the top, an image of the Eagle established as the State Emblem of the Republic of Poland. In the central part of the coin a square hole. At its left-hand side an inscription, 10, at its right-hand side an inscription, ZÅ. In the rim an inscription, RZECZPOSPOLITA POLSKA, and the notation of the year issue, 2008. Below a stylised image of a fragment of the Forbidden City in Beijing and below the Polish Olympic Committee logo. The Mintâs mark under the Eagleâs left leg: m/w.

Reverse: In the central part of the coin a square hole. On the left-hand side a stylised image of a competitor on a windsurfboard. Below the hole an inscription, POLSKA / REPREZENTACJA / OLIMPIJSKA / PEKIN / 2008 (Polish / Olympic / Representation / Beijing / 2008). ROCZNICA (90th anniversary). ROCZNICA ODZYSKANIA NIEPODLEGÅOÅCI (90th anniversary of regaining freedom). |- | colspan="4" |   |- ! colspan="4" align=center style="background:#eeeeee;"| 450 Years of the [[Polish_Post|Polish Postal Service]] (gold){{cite web | url=http://www.nbp.pl/en/banknoty/kolekcjonerskie/2008/450_LAT_POCZTY_en.pdf | title=450 Years of the Polish Postal Service coin | publisher=National Bank of Poland| accessdate=2009-01-02}} |- | colspan="2" width="50%" align=center | '''Coin designer:''' Robert Kotowicz | colspan="2" width="50%" align=center | '''Mint:''' [[Polish Mint|Mennica Polska S.A.]] |- | align=center | '''Value:''' zÅ 200 | align=center | '''Alloy:''' Au 900/1000 (Gold) | align=center | '''Quantity:''' 11,000 pcs | align=center | '''Quality:''' Proof |- | align=center | '''Issued:''' 19 November 2008 | align=center | '''Diameter:''' {{convert|27.00|mm|in|2|abbr=on}} | align=center | '''Weight:''' {{convert|15.50|g|oz ozt|2|abbr=on}} | align=center | '''Market value:''' |- | colspan="4" align=left | Obverse: On the right-hand side at the bottom, an image of the Eagle established as the state emblem of the Republic of Poland against a background of a fragment of postage stamp. In the central part, a stylized postage stamp with a fragment of the image of a watercolour picture depicting the change of horses at a postal stage. At the bottom on the left-hand side, an inscription: 200/ZÅ. On the left-hand side and at the top a circumscription: RZECZPOSPOLITA POLSKA. On the right-hand side vertically the notation of the year of issue: 2008. The Mintâs mark, m/w, under the Eagleâs left leg.

Reverse: In the central part, a stylized image of a 19th century mounted post rider on horse crossing a bridge. Below, a stylized image of the coat of arms of the Polish-Lithuanian Common-wealth in use during the reign of the king Sigismundus Augustus. On the left-hand side, a fragment of stylized image of the Wawel Cathedral and the Wawel Royal Castle in Cracow. On the right-hand side, a stylized image of St. Markâs Square in Venice and the outlines of fragments of two gondolas. At the bottom on the left-hand side, an inscription: 450/LAT (450th anniversary). Below the number "450", a stylized image of a postal trumpet. At the top, a circumscription: POCZTY POLSKIEJ (of the Polish Post). |- | colspan="4" |   |- ! colspan="4" align=center style="background:#eeeeee;"| 450 Years of the [[Polish_Post|Polish Postal Service]] (silver) |- | colspan="2" width="50%" align=center | '''Coin designer:''' Robert Kotowicz | colspan="2" width="50%" align=center | '''Mint:''' [[Polish Mint|Mennica Polska S.A.]] |- | align=center | '''Value:''' zÅ 10 | align=center | '''Alloy:''' Ag 925/1000 (Silver) | align=center | '''Quantity:''' 135,000 pcs | align=center | '''Quality:''' Proof |- | align=center | '''Issued:''' 19 November 2008 | align=center | '''Diameter:''' {{convert|32.00|mm|in|2|abbr=on}} | align=center | '''Weight:''' {{convert|14.14|g|oz ozt|2|abbr=on}} | align=center | '''Market value:''' |- | colspan="4" align=left | Obverse: At the top on the right-hand side, an image of the Eagle established as the state emblem of the Republic of Poland. In the central part, a stylized image of a postage stamp depicting stylized images of a mounted post rider on horse playing the trumpet and of trees, changing colours depending on the tilt angle. In the background of the postage stamp, a stylized image of a postal map and on the right-hand side a fragment of an image of a coach clock. On the left-hand side an inscription: 10/ZÅ. Below the inscription, vertically, the notation of the year of issue: 2008. At the bottom an inscription: RZECZPOSPOLITA /POLSKA. The Mintâs mark, m/w, under the Eagleâs left leg.

Reverse: In the central part a stylized image of a 16th century post courier. In the background a stylized fragment of a 17th century engraved copperplate with an image of an inn. At the bottom on the left-hand side an inscription: 450/LAT (450th anniversary). Below, a stylized image of a postal trumpet. On the left-hand side and at the top a circumscription: POCZTY POLSKIEJ (of the Polish Post). |- | colspan="4" |   |- ! colspan="4" align=center style="background:#eeeeee;"| 400th Anniversary of Polish Settlement in North America (gold){{cite web | url=http://www.nbp.pl/en/banknoty/kolekcjonerskie/2008/400_OSADNICTWO_en.pdf | title=400th Anniversary of Polish Settlement in North America coin | publisher=National Bank of Poland| accessdate=2009-01-02}} |- | colspan="2" width="50%" align=center | '''Coin designer:''' Roussanka Nowakowsa | colspan="2" width="50%" align=center | '''Mint:''' [[Polish Mint|Mennica Polska S.A.]] |- | align=center | '''Value:''' zÅ 100 | align=center | '''Alloy:''' Au 900/1000 (Gold) | align=center | '''Quantity:''' 9,500 pcs | align=center | '''Quality:''' Proof |- | align=center | '''Issued:''' 17 December 2008 | align=center | '''Diameter:''' {{convert|21.00|mm|in|2|abbr=on}} | align=center | '''Weight:''' {{convert|8.00|g|oz ozt|2|abbr=on}} | align=center | '''Market value:''' |- | colspan="4" align=left | Obverse: In the centre an image of the Eagle established as the State Emblem of the Republic of Poland against a stylized image of a wind rose. Below, an inscription: 100 ZÅ. On the left-hand side, the notation of the year of issue: 2008. The Mintâs mark under the Eagleâs left leg: M/ W.

Reverse: In the centre a stylized image of a wind rose. Between its arms, stylized images: on the left-hand side at the top â a man smelting glass, below â an artisan making barrels, on the right-hand side at the top - a man making potware, below â a blacksmith at work. On the rim an inscription: 400. On the ring, fragments of a stylized map of Virginia. Above, an inscription: VIRGINIA, placed on a sash. To the left of the core, images of settlers, to the right, images of Indians. Below the core, an image of the Eagle established as the State Emblem of the Republic of Poland. To the left of the Eagle, the notation of the year of issue: 2008. To the right, an inscription: 10/ZÅ. At the bottom, a semicircular inscription: RZECZPOSPOLITA POLSKA (the Republic of Poland). At the Eagleâs left leg, the Mintâs mark: m/w.

ROCZNICA (400 years). |- | colspan="4" |   |- ! colspan="4" align=center style="background:#eeeeee;"| 90th Anniversary of [[Greater_Poland_Uprising_(1918â1919)|the Greater Poland Uprising]] (gold){{cite web | url=http://www.nbp.pl/en/banknoty/kolekcjonerskie/2008/Powstanie_Wielkopolskie_en.pdf | title=90th Anniversary of the Greater Poland Uprising coin | publisher=National Bank of Poland| accessdate=2009-01-30}} |- | colspan="2" width="50%" align=center | '''Coin designer:''' Urszula Walerzak | colspan="2" width="50%" align=center | '''Mint:''' [[Polish Mint|Mennica Polska S.A.]] |- | align=center | '''Value:''' zÅ 200 | align=center | '''Alloy:''' Au 900/1000 (Gold) | align=center | '''Quantity:''' 9,400 pcs | align=center | '''Quality:''' Proof |- | align=center | '''Issued:''' 22 December 2008 | align=center | '''Diameter:''' {{convert|27.00|mm|in|2|abbr=on}} | align=center | '''Weight:''' {{convert|15.50|g|oz ozt|2|abbr=on}} | align=center | '''Market value:''' |- | colspan="4" align=left | obverse: At the bottom, on the left-hand side, an image of the Eagle established as the state emblem of the Republic of Poland. The notation: 10 ZÅ at the bottom. The mintâs mark: m/w under the Eagleâs left leg. Reverse: On the left-hand side a stylized image of a white and red rosette - as worn by insurgents of the Greater Poland Uprising - with the Eagle in different shades of grey. On the right-hand side a stylized image of a bust of [[Ignacy Jan Paderewski]]. In the background an excerpt of the appeal issued by the Command of OstrÃ³w Military District. At the top an inscription: 90. ROCZNICA (90th anniversary).
